alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 7:17PM MDT until July 04 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LARAMIE COUNTY... At 717 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hillsdale to near Hereford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Wind gusts to 57 MPH were recorded at the Cheyenne Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burns, Hillsdale and Carpenter. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 371 and 397. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
